multiplechoiceresponse.label: What is the main focus of MIT 6.S191 (2023): Reinforcement Learning?
multiplechoiceresponse.description: You can add an optional tip or note related to the prompt like this.

choicegroup.choice: Marrying reinforcement learning and deep learning
Building deep learning models using static data sets
Training robots to play against humans in real time
Exploring the history of reinforcement learning
